sourcesContent:
import React,{useState} from 'react' import classes from './NavBar.module.css' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { useGlobalStateValue } from '../../globalState/Context' const NavBar = () => { const {user,dispatch}=useGlobalStateValue() const [showSideNav,setShowSideNav]=useState(false) const [sideNavClass,setSideNavClass]=useState([classes.nav__center]) const handleSideNavClick=()=>{ if(!showSideNav){ setSideNavClass([classes.nav__center,classes.show]) }else{ setSideNavClass([classes.nav__center]) } setShowSideNav(!showSideNav) } const handleLogout=()=>{ dispatch({type:'LOGOUT'}) } return (
    HOME ABOUT CONTACT WRITE {user && LOGOUT }
{user ?
} alt="" />
:
SIGNUP LOGIN
}
) } export default NavBar
